projects.title: Online Chat application
projects.bodyText:
- Created a real-time chat application with full-stack development
 -  Integrated socket-based communication for seamless interaction and optimized frontend-backend synchronizaion.

projects.title: Mern Task management
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Task Management web application with secure OTP-based authentication and intuitive user interface for task scheduling and tracking.
 - Implemented features for real-time reminders, task status updates, and seamless CRUD operations.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a full-stack Hardware E-commerce website enabling seamless user authentication, product categorization, and real-time search functionality.
 - Implemented dynamic cart management and secure payment workflow to enhance user experience.

projects.title: Online Quiz Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and developed an interactive Online Quiz Platform tailored for children, featuring MCQ-based assessments with user authentication.
 - Integrated timed questions, instructional interface, and automated result generation with performance feedback.

projects.title: Event Management System
projects.bodyText:
- The Event Management System is a web-based application designed to streamline the organization and management of events. 
 - It facilitates efficient coordination between administrators and users, ensuring seamless event planning and execution.
